殗字的基本解释

殗
yè
病。
〔殗殜〕小病。
重叠：“攒柯挐茎，重葩殗叶。”

殗
yān
　ㄧㄢˉ
死亡。

殗
yàn
　ㄧㄢˋ
污浊。

殗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》於業切，入業，影。］
(1)见“殗殜”。
(2)重叠。
[②]［yàn］
［《集韻》於贍切，去豔，影。］
污浊。
[③]［yān］
［《集韻》衣廉切，平鹽，影。］
(1)死亡。
(2)急遽；忽然。参见“殗3忽”。

殗字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殗； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页581第36
【玉篇】於劫切【廣韻】於業切【集韻】乙業切，?音浥。病也。【揚子·方言】殗殜，微也。宋衞之閒曰殗。自關而西，秦晉之閒，凡病而不甚者曰殗殜。　又重也。【左思·吳都賦】重葩殗葉。【註】殗，重也。葉重疉貌。　又【集韻】衣廉切，音淹。義同。一曰歿也。　又【集韻】於贍切，音?。與?同。汚觸也。或作殗。

殗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
殗字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guang Yun" cuts into the industry, enters the industry, and film. ]
(1) See "殗殜".
(2) Overlap.
[②]［yàn］
["Ji Yun" cuts to Yan, goes to show, and makes a movie. ]
Dirty.
[③]［yān］
["Jiyun" Yilianqie, Pingyan, Ying. ]
(1) Death.
(2) Anxious; suddenly. See "殗3 suddenly".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殗; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 581 36
[Jade articles] Yu Jieqie [Guangyun] Yuyeqie [Jiyun] Yiyeqie,? Sound. Sick too. 【Yangtze Dialect】Dangshan, Weiye. Song Weizhi said leisurely. From the Guan to the west, the Qin and Jin dynasties are idle, and those who are sick but not serious are said to be dead.　Heavy again. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Heavy leaves. [Note] 殗, heavy also. Ye Chongwan's appearance.　[Jiyun] Yilianqie, sound flooded. The same meaning. One said he died.　[Jiyun] Yu Jianqie, sound?. Same as? Dirty touch also. Or as an offense.
